sentences.english: They love each other, living in fairyland.
sentences.chinese: 他们相亲相爱，生活如在仙境。

sentences.english: We found ourselves in the midst of a veritable fairyland.
sentences.chinese: 我们发现我们在名副其实的仙境中。

sentences.english: That is why the "Ragnarok"will bring the destruction to the world.
sentences.chinese: 这就是为什么“仙境传说”带来的破坏给世界。

sentences.english: It was the sweetest thing that ever could be, it was a fantasy, a dream come true.
sentences.chinese: 那是最甜蜜的事，让我如临仙境，梦想成真。

sentences.english: This is Tianmu Lake also known as the Green Fairyland.
sentences.chinese: 这里就是有着绿色仙境之称的天目湖。

sentences.english: Ever wished you take that hot date on trip to Wonderland?
sentences.chinese: 你也想体验一次仙境旅程吗？

sentences.english: He followed what she said , and they created a world named Terabithia.
sentences.chinese: 他跟她说了什么，他们创造了一个世界，命名为仙境。

sentences.english: Thee book is often referred to by the abbreviated title Alice in Wonderland.
sentences.chinese: 这本书是常被缩写名称“爱丽丝梦游仙境。

sentences.english: It is one of the last known underwater wonderlands on Earth.
sentences.chinese: 它是地球上最后一处海底仙境。

sentences.english: We shall sail merrily across the seven seas and the thirteen rivers of fairyland.
sentences.chinese: 我们要快快乐乐地航行在仙境里的七海和十三河。

sentences.english: They look like the castles in fairyland.
sentences.chinese: 他们看起来像仙境中的城堡。

sentences.english: As I was hang there, I see wonderland.
sentences.chinese: 尚存一息我眼见了仙境。

sentences.english: If there is really a fairyland in the world, it is the Jiuzhaigou Valley.
sentences.chinese: 如果世间真有仙境，那就是九寨沟。

sentences.english: Walking into Hong Kong Disneyland, you feel you are in a wonderland.
sentences.chinese: 走在香港迪斯尼乐园里，你仿若进入了一个仙境。

sentences.english: Even the tormented Byron seemed to enjoy himself in this celestial mountainscenery.
sentences.chinese: 即使是有些哀怨的拜伦似乎都很享受这里的仙境。

sentences.english: and he had sketches for "Alice in Wonderland" years and years ago.
sentences.chinese: 他在很多年前就写出了《爱丽斯梦游仙境》的草稿。

definition: the Peach Blossom Spring, a hidden land of peace and prosperity/utopia
nothing more beautiful can be imagined (idiom)
"heavenly lake", lake situated on a mountain/used as the name of numerous lakes, such as 長白山天池|长白山天池[Chang2 bai2 shan1 Tian1 chi2]
heaven on Earth/nickname for the city Suzhou
